name: Adventure Online
description:
Hello my nickname is Louxi90 and here is a game created with Pico 8 in 7 days non stop for a challenge.

With pico 8 we program in Lua (programming language)

And the Lua looks complicated but not at all it took me 1 hour to get all the basics.

Here is the link to download Pico 8 : https://www.lexaloffle.com/games.php?page=updates
